tests.name: Quiz - QUESTIONS.txt
tests.description: Check if the answers in QUESTIONS.txt are correct. This file must be edited so that the correct ( ) choices are replaced with (X) and no other changes are made to the file.

tests.name: Code - threads_main
tests.description: Checks the threads_main program for correct output. The consumer threads may get turns in different orders on different executions (hence the use of 'sed' to elide their indexes), but the queue elements are removed in a consistent order.
